about_the_game:
The quick card game of atomic energy!

Step into the microscopic world of particles with Protons & Neutrons an exciting card game where atomic power collide!

Players take control of Proton and Neutron factions, competing to unlock all the cards by winning intense matches. With each victory, you'll have a chance to unlock new cards, build stronger factions, and face increasingly challenging enemies in this thrilling race for atomic supremacy.

The game is designed to be quick and easy to pick up, offering a thrilling experience without being time-consuming. Each match is fast-paced, making it perfect for shorter sessions.

The game features a drag-and-drop system, multiple card combination advantages, unique card powers and bonuses, enemy special abilities, and a dynamic inventory size that adjusts based on your performance, enabling players to strategize and customize their decks for maximum impact.

The game itself offers great replayability thanks to:

Distinct factions: Each faction has its own strengths, weaknesses, and playstyle, offering fresh strategic choices each time you play.

Unique cards with special bonuses: The game is packed with a variety of cards, each providing individual bonuses and effects. Every draw brings new possibilities for countering your opponent's moves.

Dynamic enemy growth: As you grow stronger, so does your enemy. The challenge continuously escalates, keeping you on your toes as the stakes rise.

Multiple difficulty levels: The game can scale in difficulty, allowing you to face off against different levels of enemies. Whether you’re a beginner or a seasoned player, there’s always a suitable challenge waiting for you.

Enemy abilities: The enemy has access to various abilities, challenging you to constantly adapt and rethink your strategies with every encounter. To make things even more difficult, they can combine these abilities, making them even tougher to defeat.

Randomized card unlocks: Each new game offers a different order of card unlocks, creating a unique experience every time you play.

Please note that certain features or functionalities are only available in the full version of the game.
